body:
Hey everyone,

Today, I'm going to be talking about something a bit glum. But I encourage everyone to read this. Please note that this is NOT an attention seeking post.

Lately, I've noticed an increase of inappropriate jokes (rape jokes). I'd like to point out that this can be a very sensitive topic for some people, me included. Many of the players that make these jokes probably do not realise the damage these 'jokes' can do. I've gotten them alot, from multiple people, and I would like to state that I was almost raped a couple of years back. These comments stir up memories that I do not need. Mods do a great job at keeping these people at bay, but they can't be on 24/7. I'd just like to make this known, if it isn't already.

So, think before you type. "Is this really what I want to do? Why do I want to say this?"

Thanks for reading,

-Sky
body_tagged:
Hey everyone,

Today, I'm going to be talking about something a bit glum. But I encourage everyone to read this. Please note that this is NOT an attention seeking post.

Lately, I've noticed an increase of inappropriate jokes (rape jokes). I'd like to point out that this can be a very sensitive topic for some people, me included. Many of the players that make these jokes probably do not realise the damage these 'jokes' can do. I've gotten them alot, from multiple people, and I would like to state that I was almost raped a couple of years back. These comments stir up memories that I do not need. Mods do a great job at keeping these people at bay, but they can't be on 24/7. I'd just like to make this known, if it isn't already.

So, think before you type. "Is this really what I want to do? Why do I want to say this?"

Thanks for reading,

-Sky
title: Regarding certain behaviour

replies.body:
Yeah. It is really inappropriate and I'm sorry about what happened. I know someone in my school last year got raped once and almost again (not her fault whatsoever), and it really tears you apart as a person. This is nothing to joke about and I cringe at the thought of such jokes being made. I feel like this is a sensitive topic and should be taken seriously and punishments handed out accordingly. I have no experience with such, but I know what those experiences can do do a person and I really wish the best for you and hope that such jokes are not used in the future. Thanks for alerting staff this is happening on my behalf and the community's. It really is bothersome that this is happening. 

Thanks for coming out and saying such, not to be cheesy, but that's pretty damn brave of you for coming out and saying that. Even if it is over a screen. Much respect. 

-ShadowSlayerZ7

Thanks for alerting staff this is happening on my behalf and the community's. It really is bothersome that this is happening. 

Thanks for coming out and saying such, not to be cheesy, but that's pretty damn brave of you for coming out and saying that. Even if it is over a screen. Much respect. 

-ShadowSlayerZ7

replies.body:
Did they attack you in-game? Do you have screenshots of it or do you remember their name? If you do, you shouldn't hesitate to report them, every player who attacked you with these stupid jokes. I want to see the staff do everything they can to stop it, right now, if I so need to talk sense into them.

I don't really understand how it could be fun to joke about something like rape, especially to joke about it with someone who has been a victim (or almost been a victim) of it. No offense to you now Notalgicular, but, is it really that fun to joke about it? What do you get out of it?

I can't say I understand how it affects someone who has been a victim of it, but I knew a person way back in 2009 who was, a person who couldn't handle emotions and decided to end her life.

I think it's really strong of you __SkyGirl__9 and how you keep your head up yet today admires me! I also agree with you, you shouldn't be reminded of it, even if it has been years ago since it happened.

replies.body: That's still bringing up the memories of that bad time. I'm sure everyone's opinion would change a little if they were a victim (I'm not a victim. Just to clarify). A lot of people are seriously changed after. At a mention of it, depending on the person and situation, etc. could have a complete emotional breakdown because of the upbringing of such memories. So it does matter when someone says it, regardless of age, intelligence or maturity, because it's a super touchey topic and something that seriously affects you as a person.

replies.body:
Yeah, well. Like Shadow said, you can't really escape memories. I understand that this stuff happens online. Even in the real world people poke fun at me because of this. I'm just like "wtf it wasn't even my fault." So, I learned to deal with it. But I can't get over memories, not many people can.
I guess it might be hard to understand, but trust me, it is not easy to "get over it", no matter who the comment is coming from.
